title: To the Woods
description: To the Woods describes a young girl's observations of woodland animals and plants. The text has a repetitive pattern that reinforces key vocabulary words. Illustrations support the text.
reviewWords: bushes, climbs, crawl, hiding, squirrel, woods
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify the main idea and details
phonics: Short Vowels                : Read words with the short /i/ vowel sound
grammar: Verbs                : Recognize and use verbs in sentences
